sentences.sentence: The house was full of the rank smell of urine.
sentences.translation: 这屋子里到处有一股尿的臊味。

sentences.sentence: The doctor took a urine sample and a blood sample.
Wherever you go, feces, urine, blood, vomit, rotten flesh and most meat will be disgusting.
sentences.translation: 无论你走到哪里，粪便、尿液、血液、呕吐物、大部分腐烂的肉都会令人作呕。
